title: Emprez BI Module - Do not count certain employees
content: For several reasons, you may not want an employee to be counted in Emprez BI data.(The employee is scheduled but does not punch in, for example).By default, all employees are included in Emprez BI when the module is activated, to exclude them, here are the steps to follow:In the employee folder, click on the employee's name,Uncheck Included in Emprez BI,Â Then click on Save.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
